name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForGlomerulonephritis
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Glomerulonephritis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to glomerulonephritis and is listed as a renal disorder on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes glomerulonephritis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes acute glomerulonephritis.)
